page.title: 04RECREATION WORTHING WEEKEND
page.content: I live in Chester Avenue and nearly every day I play football.I go over the field to kick the football about or I go in goal.I sometimes ride about on my bike around church walk and in ten acres or otherwise I go around my street. Sometimes I go to brooklands on my bike so that I can go on the BMX track and enjoy myself.I sometimes go in the adventure playground but not often.In the playground they have got swings a wooden house with a tunnel and more.I sometimes go down to Home, field park and go on the swings.I sometimes go down to the beach for a swim I sometimes take lunch too, but not often. On Saturday I am always with my friends at the field or in ten acres. BY KERRY DAWKINS OF LYNDHURST SCHOOL.
